text: Thorkil Kristensen (9 October 1899 â€“ 26 June 1989) was a Danish politician, finance minister, professor in national economy, and futurist. He was the 1st Secretary-General of the OECD from 1961 until 1969. ==References== Category:1899 births Category:1989 deaths Category:Danish politicians Category:Danish academics Category:Secretaries General of OECD
